ygData.subject: Re: Malachite in Qeynos? NO MORE?!?!
ygData.msgSnippet: It is not so much the fact the cost is more overall for everyone there, but for YOU.  I can buy food cheap in Halas, but when I go to Surefall, the prices are
ygData.messageBody:
It is not so much the fact the cost is more overall for everyone there, but
for YOU. I can buy food cheap in Halas, but when I go to Surefall, the
prices are THROUGH THE ROOF! It is cheaper for me to pay people to buy my
food for me and I still save money over what the Vendor charges.

And yes, go to a jeweler, they should have it, even in Qeynos.

Bayne, Shaman

-->-----Original Message-----
-->From: Matthew Musingo [mailto:vmjh@...]
-->Sent: Wednesday, May 05, 1999 8:45 PM
-->To: _EQ_Magic@onelist.com
-->Subject: [_EQ_Magic] Malachite in Qeynos? NO MORE?!?!
-->
-->
-->From: Matthew Musingo <vmjh@...>
-->
-->After patching and logging into Fennin Ro, I proceeded to
-->visit the Herb
-->Shop near the Magic Guild (ie Orgy of Magic Casting Flooding
-->Your Chat
-->Box) to pick up some Malachite for my summoning my fiery
-->buddy. Imagine
-->my surprise when he had none! I shouted (which I usually do not do)
-->saying why the was no more Malachite and where I could get
-->some. Someone
-->metioned I could visit Erudin for the Green Goodness. I
-->went to Erudin
-->(when I could have been going to SplitPaw) and found out
-->they cost 2 more
-->silver than they were in Qeynos! (7 silver). Now I see this
-->lack of a
-->basic component in a human city as a discouragment to all
-->magicians who
-->start out here. Does anybody agree or is there some news I
-->didn't not yet
-->hear about?
-->
-->Thanks
--> Kapolokok
-->
-->
-->*********************************************************************
-->"Rumpletweezer ran the Dinky Tinky shop in the foot of the
-->
-->Magic oak tree by the wobbly dum dum tree in the shade of
-->the magic glade down in Dingly Dell. Here he sold contraceptives..."
--> -- Python
